title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 451 - Safe Boating
content:

§ 451.8 - New york safe boating course requirements
§ 451.9 - Instructor or commercial organization recordkeeping
§ 451.10 - Instructor certification
§ 451.11 - Commercial organization certification
§ 451.12 - Suspension or revocation of instructor or commercial organization certifications

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 451

Statutory authority: Navigation Law, art. 4; Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law, §3.09[8]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
